info.title: Inkeep Agents Manage API
info.description: REST API for the management of the Inkeep Agent Framework.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: The requested resource was not found.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for the request, useful for troubleshooting.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

detail.description: A detailed explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem, providing context and specifics about what went wrong.

message.description: A concise error message suitable for display to end users. May be truncated if the full detail is long.

get.description: Check if the management service is healthy
List all projects within a tenant with pagination
Get a single project by ID

delete.description: Delete a project. Will fail if the project has existing resources.

409.description: Cannot delete project with existing resources

200.description: List of agent relations retrieved successfully
List of agent graphs retrieved successfully
List of agent tool relations retrieved successfully

201.description: Agent artifact component association created successfully

get.summary: Check if Artifact Component is Associated with Agent

201.description: Agent data component association created successfully

get.summary: Check if Data Component is Associated with Agent

200.description: List of artifact components retrieved successfully
List of context configurations retrieved successfully
List of data components retrieved successfully
List of external agents retrieved successfully

get.summary: Initiate OAuth login for MCP tool
get.description: Detects OAuth requirements and redirects to authorization server

400.description: OAuth not supported or configuration error

get.description: List all API keys for a tenant with optional pagination

200.description: List of API keys retrieved successfully

post.description: Create a new API key for a graph. Returns the full key (shown only once).

key.description: The full API key (shown only once)

get.description: Get a specific API key by ID (does not return the actual key)

put.description: Update an API key (currently only expiration date can be changed)

post.description: Create a complete agent graph with all agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

get.description: Retrieve a complete agent graph definition with all agents, tools, and relationships

put.description: Update or create a complete agent graph with all agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

delete.description: Delete a complete agent graph and cascade to all related entities (relationships, not agents/tools)

post.description: Create a complete project with all graphs, agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

get.description: Retrieve a complete project definition with all graphs, agents, tools, and relationships

put.description: Update or create a complete project with all graphs, agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

delete.description: Delete a complete project and cascade to all related entities (graphs, agents, tools, relationships)

get.description: Handles OAuth authorization codes and completes the authentication flow

302.description: Redirect to frontend after successful OAuth
